cmdSubCategory.name: Screwbots
cmdSubCategory.description: Hires the WaffleBomber to destroy all future bot messages in invoked channel.

cmdSubCategory.name: UnScrewBots
cmdSubCategory.description: Fire the WaffleBomber - thus allowing other bots to again post messages.

cmdCategory.description: View various Gats Stats, such as top snipers, or best clan killstreaks.

cmdSubCategory.name: Clanstats
cmdSubCategory.description: See the overall stats for a given clan (full name, non-abbreviated).

cmdSubCategory.name: Playerstats
cmdSubCategory.description: See the overall stats for a given player.

cmdSubCategory.name: Top
cmdSubCategory.description: See 'top' statistics such as best players with shoguns, and longest clan killstreaks. Optional pagination parameter accepted too.

cmdSubCategory.name: Top5
cmdSubCategory.description: Sets the status of the bot globally.

cmdSubCategory.name: ChangeLog
cmdSubCategory.description: View the latest changes in the changelog

cmdSubCategory.name: Avatar
cmdSubCategory.description: Get a user's avatar through mentions.

cmdSubCategory.name: Drip
cmdSubCategory.description: Driiiiip

cmdSubCategory.name: Feed
cmdSubCategory.description: Give wfl waffles.

cmdSubCategory.name: Help
cmdSubCategory.description: Learn how to use WaffleBot. Provide a category to get detailed help.

cmdSubCategory.name: How
cmdSubCategory.description: Try 'how old is kendron' to find out Kendron's age.

cmdSubCategory.name: Invite
cmdSubCategory.description: Invite Link to add WaffleBot to your server!

cmdSubCategory.name: Nani
cmdSubCategory.description: UwU notice me senpai.

cmdSubCategory.name: Ping
cmdSubCategory.description: Shows the ping in ms between client -> server.

cmdSubCategory.name: Salt
cmdSubCategory.description: Just why?

cmdSubCategory.name: Say
cmdSubCategory.description: I will repeat what you say.

cmdSubCategory.name: SuperSay
cmdSubCategory.description: Look at me! I am the captain now.

cmdSubCategory.name: Statistics
cmdSubCategory.description: Some WaffleBot statistics.

cmdSubCategory.name: Join
cmdSubCategory.description: Provide the name of a VOICE CHANNEL to join.

cmdSubCategory.name: Leave
cmdSubCategory.description: Leaves the voice channel.

cmdSubCategory.name: Loop
cmdSubCategory.description: Turns on looping for music queue

cmdSubCategory.name: Pause
cmdSubCategory.description: Pauses the music player (currently disabled).

cmdSubCategory.name: Play
cmdSubCategory.description: Plays a song given the youtube-url or a text string.

cmdSubCategory.name: Queue
cmdSubCategory.description: Displays the current songs in the queue.

cmdSubCategory.name: Oops
cmdSubCategory.description: Removes the last song you accidentally added to the queue.

cmdSubCategory.name: Repeat
cmdSubCategory.description: Adds the currently-playing song to the end of the queue.

cmdSubCategory.name: Skip
cmdSubCategory.description: Skips the currently-playing, or removes a song from the queue given he queue position.

cmdSubCategory.name: Song
cmdSubCategory.description: Reveals the currently-playing song.

cmdSubCategory.name: UnLoop
cmdSubCategory.description: Turns off looping for music queue

cmdSubCategory.name: Unpause
cmdSubCategory.description: Unpauses the current song.

cmdCategory.description: A list of commands only the owner of the bot can use. Right now, just Dorfnox.

cmdSubCategory.name: Servers
cmdSubCategory.description: Check out which servers WaffleBot is in.

cmdSubCategory.name: SetStatus
cmdSubCategory.description: Sets the status of the bot globally.

cmdSubCategory.name: P!Hint
cmdSubCategory.description: Run 'w p!hint' before running 'p!hint' for a little ***more*** help.

cmdSubCategory.name: WhoDatPokemon
cmdSubCategory.description: If a pokemon has just spawned, use this command to figure out it's name.

cmdCategory.description: Integrate with applcations like Twitch, letting you know when a streamer goes live.

cmdSubCategory.name: Twitch Enable
cmdSubCategory.description: (Staff Only) Enables going-live notifications for a give twitch livestreamer. Provide their home url or url-name

cmdSubCategory.name: Twitch Disable
cmdSubCategory.description: (Staff Only) Disables going-live notifications for a given twitch livestreamer. Provide their home url or url-name
